subject: Figure Skating
Cross-Country Skiing
Bobsledding
Ski Jumping
lead_paragraph: The American Polina Edmunds became the second-youngest woman to win the women’s singles title at the Four Continents Figure Skating Championships in Seoul, South Korea, on Sunday.
snippet: The American Polina Edmunds became the second-youngest woman to win the women’s singles title at the Four Continents Figure Skating Championships in Seoul, South Korea, on Sunday.
